locks.name: Butterfly Room Grey Lock (to West Cactus Alley)

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Butterfly Room Careful Jump
note: Kill all the Zoas and don't pick up their drops. If the door is unlocked, stand in the doorframe and jump across the room.
Otherwise, jump across the sand, starting 1.5 tiles away from the sandfall. Hold jump and forward the whole time. Samus will dip into the sand, but still make it to the other side.

to.note: When entering the room from above, fall to either side and avoid the sand, as it may lead to a softlock. It's best not to turn around during the fall.

strats.name: Frozen Zoa Bridge
strats.note: Use the frozen Zoas as a bridge. Falling will require Samus to use ice beam and a crouch jump to escape.

strats.name: Suitless Bombs
strats.note: It is relatively easy to get out of the sand by rapidly placing bombs.

strats.name: Butterfly Room Careful Jump (Left to Right)
note: Kill all the Zoas and don't pick up their drops. If the door is unlocked, stand in the doorframe and jump across the room.
Otherwise, jump across the sand, starting 1.5 tiles away from the sandfall. Hold jump and forward the whole time. Samus will dip into the sand, but still make it to the other side.

strats.name: Butterfly Room Suitless Sand Escape (Left to Right)
note: It is possible to get out of the sand with nothing.
While holding down, crouch jump then press forward diagonal to clip into the wall enough to jump out.
strats.devNote: This will never be in logic because there are easier ways to cross the room, but can be used to escape the sand.

strats.name: Cross Room Jump with Bomb Boost
note: Only requires a runway of approximately 0.5 tiles in the adjacent room.
Bomb boost through the doorway and hold right.

strats.name: Butterfly Room Door Lock Wall Ice Clip
strats.note: Repeatedly freeze the Zoas to slowly push Samus into the wall and through the locked doorway.
strats.devNote: The drops will keep Samus at high energy, but 2 hits enemy damage were added as a worst-case scenario where the next-to-last Zoa you kill doesn't give you energy.
